feed.title: bewCloud Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v1.7.1
entry.content:
Fix for file upload via web in Chrome and Firefox.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v1.7.0...v1.7.1

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v1.8.0
entry.content:
This includes optional MFA support (requires using the new configuration file released in v1.7.0) with TOTP and Passkeys.

What's Changed

  • Add Optional MFA Support by @0xGingi in https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/pull/61

New Contributors

  • @0xGingi made their first contribution in https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/pull/61

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v1.7.1...v1.8.0

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v1.9.0
entry.content:
This includes SSO as an optional login/signup method via OIDC.

You'll need to be using the new bewcloud.config.ts file to set it up, and don't forget the new ENV vars (client id and client secret) in the .env file!

What's Changed

  • Implement (optional) SSO via OIDC (OpenID Connect) by @BrunoBernardino in https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/pull/64

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v1.8.0...v1.9.0

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v1.9.1
entry.content:
Fixes a problem with SSO behind a reverse proxy.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v1.9.0...v1.9.1

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v1.9.2
entry.content:
Fixes a problem with strict SSO providers (path in redirect_uri) and a regression with DAV discoverability in some clients.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v1.9.1...v1.9.2
